items.title: A plug n play template
items.description: Just edit the config.json file with details about your company and voila your beautiful state of the art landing page is ready to go live! Remember to also update your assets, add any images you want to show to /assets/images and link them in the config.json

items.title: Make it your own!
items.description: Play around with the theme.ts file and configure the color palette to match the branding of your company! If you're feeling wild, maybe change some tailwind css as well!

services.title: What We Do
services.subtitle: All the best technologies out there!
services.description: distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.

items.name: Custom Software Development
items.description: This involves creating tailor-made software solutions according to the specific requirements of your clients. It could range from web and mobile applications to enterprise software systems.

items.name: Software Maintenance and Support
items.description: After deploying software, clients often require ongoing maintenance, updates, and technical support. Providing these services ensures the smooth operation of their software systems.

items.name: Software Integration
items.description: Many businesses use multiple software applications that need to work together seamlessly. Offering integration services helps clients connect different systems and improve workflow efficiency.

items.name: Quality Assurance and Testing
items.description: Ensuring the quality and reliability of software is crucial. Offering testing services such as functional testing, performance testing, and security testing helps clients deliver robust and bug-free software.
